review: We had consulted the doctor and it was for my friend's uncle. He had breathing-related issue. *** ****** *** **** ***** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. He was able to recover. We have plan to visit again. There was no waiting time when I went.  I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. No medical tests was done and told that it was not needed. He is fine now.

I went to hospital as I had health issue related to chest pain. The doctor and the treatment was good. ECG and blood test was done. Medicines was prescribed if pain was there, he told to take. There was no waiting time when I went.   I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I need to go again for check up.

I had consulted the doctor as I had an irregular heartbeat issue. Doctor was fine and diagnosed pretty well. He prescribed medicines but I didn't take it because I got better after that. They checked BP for me. There was no waiting time when I went. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Hospitality was good. I am satisfied with the treatment given.

We had been to the doctor as one of my relative had issue regarding heart problem. *** ****** *** ****. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I went for consultation. Medical tests was done. Medicines was prescribed. There was no waiting time when I went. My relative fine now. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I would rate the doctor 5/5.

He is a very good person *** * **** ************ ****** *** treats his patients with utmost care and morality. He is very efficient and his medical abilities are really commendable. ** ** **** * **** ******* ******* ******* ** *** **** ***** I have sent many of my relatives and friends to him for necessary treatment and everyone of them is immensely satisfied with him. In fact his brilliant treatment has kept myself as well as my kins quite healthy with a positive hearty life.

My uncle had visited the hospital and it was health problem. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. It was heart related issue, his BP was fluctuating actually. Medical Test was also suggested and done. There was no waiting time in the hospital. My uncle is fine now. Hospitality was good.
A great human being than a renowned cardiologist.He is very sincere and a good moral characterities.I salute him.üôèüåé
